## Material.transparencyMode property

Sets the transparency mode of the material. Defaults to -1.

\| Value \| Type \| \| \-\-\--- \| \-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-- \| \| 0 \| OPAQUE (default) \| \| 1 \| ALPHATEST \| \| 2 \| ALPHABLEND \| \| 3 \| ALPHATESTANDBLEND \| \| 4 \| AUTO (ALPHABLEND if alpha OPAQUE otherwise \|

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transparencyMode: number;
```
